About

Hello, I'm Yuya Saito and I'm a front end developer / web designer in Tokyo, Japan.
Seven is my handpicked links of front-end dev related stuff. I will pick up articles, feeds, books and etc.
I will try my best to pick up the most relavant information. Each entry will be updated even after it's published so relavancy will keep up to date.
I really thank everyone who actually create stuffs I link to.
